website_summaries.verdict: Helps you defy gravity while taking the perfect selfie.
pros: This case allows you to stick your phone nearly anywhere and remotely take a picture
Sticks to wood almost as well as it sticks to glass
Includes a kickstand for setting on a ledge
Can stretch to fit many phone styles
cons: This product can be used many times, but may lose its sticky ability eventually

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received Anti Gravity Universal Phone Holder. Placed the product on my cell phone and applied it to my mirror. My cell phone feel off the mirror and cracked my cell phone and now I'm having to replace my cell phone. Please do not waste your time or money buying this piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Beckie

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got it!
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile, can use in the car on the window or stick to other glass and painted walls, wood, haven’t tried everywhere yet. Like the kickstand feature. Remote works good. I envision using this more for sticking my phone places to watch things or listen to stuff, not so much the photos, but the remote will be useful at our family gatherings!
customer_reviews.author: bugg

customer_reviews.title: Worked fairly well
customer_reviews.text: It took a little "getting use to" and didn't seem like it was working at first. However, once we figured it out, it "did the trick" for us as we wanted to use it to get a family picture of all of us while on a vacation in Florida last week. We were surprised that the sticky part held as well as it did! A little pricey we thought though for what you actually get.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Trezona

customer_reviews.title: It's so much fun to take "selfies" with this great new product
customer_reviews.text: It's so much fun to take "selfies" with this great new product! Perfect for a group selfie -- no need to squeeze everybody in to the shot. Attaches to your phone easily, and the adhesive sticks virtually everywhere! With no damage to surfaces. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PatsyH

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Pointless!
customer_reviews.text: I like this however, it isn’t sturdy at all. It isn’t able to remain stuck to anything due to the weight of my phone iPhone 6s Plus. That defeats the point of its purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. MoohVinOn ... ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Really only worked about 5 times, but it was great while it worked. I am going to try to find replacement ‘sticky stuff’ for this product. But honestly, unless it’s just a one time use thing, I wouldn’t buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa E.

customer_reviews.title: It is well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had seen someone that I work with using this and I knew I had to have it! 2 days later, I was having a blast with my selfie stick it. It is well made and easy to use. I took it to a family communion party this weekend, and the pre-teens and teens went crazy for it. Before long all the adults were asking me about it. Remote worked well in my hand, behind my back, and in my pocket. Nice for those pics that you didn't want the remote to show. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The remote for snapping pics is great as well
customer_reviews.text: It's been so helpful for my videos and getting full body shots. The remote for snapping pics is great as well, not having to hold my phone is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Used it a couple times in my bathroom mirror. It falls off after like 1 or 2 minutes. Havent used it on any other surfaces yet or the bluetooth remote
customer_reviews.author: Shattered screen

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to your smart phone. Easy to use and takes great pictures! I'm going on vacation in a few weeks and look forward to using my Selfie Stick it to capture some great shots of my husband and me rather than asking a passerby to take it for me.
customer_reviews.author: marie zizzamia

customer_reviews.title: Works great...until it doesn't : /
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! So fantastic! Helped us get the only family Easter photo we have. Unfortunately, it's plastic and the plastic "cap" with the sticky stuff broke off after less than a month's light use. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Interested Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Saw this product online and decided to buy it for my kids and our family dog of course. This item was fantastic! Kids had fun with it for hours and we were finally able to get some amazing picture with our dog (Holly). The treat tray kept Holly mesmerized and was able to get her attention to take perfect pics. Would recommend this to anyone looking for the perfect family shot with your furry loved one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient, carry it right on your phone.
customer_reviews.text: What a fun and convenient product! Fits easily over my phone and sticks well to any surface. Much easier to take selfies than holding your phone up in the air trying to squeeze into a photo!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good idea. I bought it for my daughter and her dog and they’ve had lots of fun with it and got some really good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Shiannpaige

customer_reviews.title: “What is that?” 🤔
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option for those who like to take selfies. The remote is key and makes picture taking so much easier. Sticks well to most surfaces. The adhesive disk tends to get dirty with multiple uses so cleaning it by running under warm water is necessary. Always fun when to use it in public and have people come up to you and say “What is that”!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Stagliano

customer_reviews.title: does not stick more than 3times
customer_reviews.text: the remote works well. but you cannot stick the product on a wall or mirror more than 3 or 4 times. It stops sticking and phone falls to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s great!!! Love it! So easy and it sticks to everything. Def recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Gachette

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertise
customer_reviews.text: Came in extremely handy when we all wanted to be in the group shot and nobody there to take it for us. Worked very well even in the cold, and with practice you can hide the remote so not to get it in the shot!
customer_reviews.author: tom lynch

customer_reviews.title: good one
customer_reviews.text: I can carry in my purse anywhere . I like to take photo with 10 sec timer . So that I dont have to hold it in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: pallavi sunkari

customer_reviews.title: Only works with maybe smaller phones?
customer_reviews.text: Does not work properly , dropped my phone multiple times because this thing could not hold it properly my phone is a little big but the description said it can fit any size phone so idkkk I wasn’t happy
customer_reviews.author: joselyn gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s working exactly as claimed. I love it. Will buy their other related accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pet lover photoshoot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a secret santa for a pet lover. They said it worked as described and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sux
customer_reviews.text: Will NOT synch up to my phone..lG. Guess I'll be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: B Camp

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Does not stick well. The green part covers the camera whole.
customer_reviews.author: Roni Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget. Its small, compact and preety awesome to be able to take a selfie and not have a huge head compared to everyone else in pix. Also comes with clear. Understandable instructions. I'm so glad I overheard Ginny talking about this awesome gadget over lunch
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was never good at taking selfies. Now I'm the selfie queen, thanks to selfie stick it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Mims

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to follow instructions. Syncs well with Bluetooth and my pup loves the treat tray!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to set up and use! It connected to my Bluetooth right away without any issues. I am already having a blast using my new selfie stick and I can’t wait to bring it on my next vacation with me!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Valenti

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Not so good. My phone fall down 2 times. Finally i don’t use it yet
customer_reviews.author: Lesperance O.

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Allows you to get into position and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Allows you to get into position and take a better selfie
customer_reviews.author: Ray Mooney

customer_reviews.title: For all selfie addicts !!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 right away. All love the product. A must have for every selfie taker.
customer_reviews.author: alma magnone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift and she loved it, so many cute photos!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product, for a short time
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it sort of carried my phone in a sling type device and there's a treat tray to get my pup to look to the camera, but it doesn't have the staying power that the description states. Especially after being used one or two times. I've followed the directions and I'm now having to repair my iPhone screen because it fell towards the floor on its side and shattered the entire screen. Mind you, it was only maybe 2 feet above ground but it hit concrete after coming off of a glass window. (Clean window, at that.)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth FitzGerald

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Selfie Takers!!!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family is having a blast with this! So easy to use, sticks anywhere and lets you take awesome selfies and videos by clicking the tiny remote that fits right on your keychain!! No more waiting around to ask someone to take your next family pic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tlepore

customer_reviews.title: It works great! I did play around with it for it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use it for its intended purpose, I use it to hold my phone on the treadmill as I watch Netflix! It works great! I did play around with it for it’s intended purpose and it works great that way too but, wouldn’t it be easier to just ask someone to take your picture at that point after you find a place to stick it to then pose for a picture?
customer_reviews.author: William A. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay sticky
customer_reviews.text: Sticky part got dull quickly, even cleaning didn't fix it. Good little remote though but now i have to rig it on other things with my pop
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this even though I do not have a pet. This really sticks on to anything! I used it at a family gathering & everyone wanted one! It's very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: WOWlady

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient when using in a location that has a wall that you can stick-it.
customer_reviews.author: Tai S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to use, convenient to have: it small to store when not using.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product!! We absolutely love how easy to use and how portable the selfie stick it is.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Amityville NY Love love love my Selfie Stick-It
customer_reviews.text: Susan D. Amityville NY Love love love my Selfie Stick-It... Awesome product. Just ordered 2 more for my girls!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan DeGraff

customer_reviews.title: I love it.  It is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! No more reaching out and trying to get as many people as possible or carrying a stick or asking a stranger to take your picture. Brilliant idea!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia McCreesh

product_meta.title: Hands Free Anti Gravity Universal Phone Holder That Sticks to Anything, Take The Perfect Selfie, Mount on Any Surface and Watch Videos or Movies, Includes Bonus Bluetooth Remote for Photos (Black)
feature_bullets: Universal Fit for All Phones: Stretch the silicone wrap around any phone or case with ease. Universal & compatible with any mobile device big and small including all versions of Apple iPhone, Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel and more.

Easily Stick & Remove: Attach the anti-gravity case to windows, glass, metal, tiles, walls, and even trees. Don’t stop there, use the case for other hands-free activities such as a kickstand, car phone mount, dash holder or wireless bluetooth camera. Slowly twist off for damage free removal.
Bluetooth Remote: Easily connect the wireless camera remote to any mobile device through Bluetooth (both iOS & Android). Take pictures from up to 30 feet away.
6 Color Options: Available in Black, White, Green, Red, Pink, Purple

Money-Back Guarantee: The Selfie Stick It was created by the inventor of the original Selfie Stick. Confidence in our product is directly reflected in our 60-Day Money Back Guarantee. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase in 60-Day, reach out to us through customer support.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars56 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Car phone mount, Nano-suction cup, Phone kickstand, Record videos, Take photos, Phone Holder, Selfies, Anti gravity case, Hands free, Bluetooth camera
